words.source: H6258 ('attah, adverb with conjunctive waw) 'now'; KJV 'Now therefore', ESV 'And now', NASB 'Now'
H2009 (hinneh, demonstrative particle) 'behold/look'; KJV 'behold', ESV 'behold', NASB 'behold'
H6818 (tsa'aqah, noun common fs construct) 'cry/outcry'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the cry of'
H1121 (ben, noun common mp construct) 'sons/children'; KJV 'the children of', ESV 'the people of', NASB 'the sons of'
H935 (bo', Qal perfect 3fs) 'to come'; KJV 'is come', ESV 'has come', NASB 'has come'
H413 ('el, preposition + 1cs suffix) 'to me'; KJV 'unto me', ESV/NASB 'to me'
H1571 (gam, adverb with conjunctive waw) 'also/moreover'; KJV 'and...also', ESV 'moreover', NASB 'furthermore'
H7200 (ra'ah, Qal perfect 1cs) 'to see'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'I have seen'
H853 ('et, direct object marker); untranslated in English
H3906 (lachats, noun common ms absolute with definite article) 'oppression/pressure'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the oppression'
H834 ('asher, relative particle) 'which/with which'; KJV 'wherewith', ESV 'with which', NASB 'with which'
H3905 (lachats, Qal active participle mp absolute) 'to oppress/press'; KJV 'oppress', ESV 'oppress', NASB 'are oppressing'
H853 ('et, direct object marker + 3mp suffix) 'them'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'them'
